notes: Iconic muscle car based on Coronet platform. 1968-1970 models featured Coke-bottle styling. 1969 Charger famously used in Dukes of Hazzard. Daytona aerodynamic variant for NASCAR. Hemi engine legendary. Vintage muscle car requires specialized knowledge. Data sourced from Wikipedia Dodge Charger article, January 2025 revision.

Compact car initially full-size (1960-1961), then compact (1963-1976). Available with Slant-6 or V8 engines. GTS performance variant. Popular drag racing platform. Vintage complexity. Data sourced from Wikipedia Dodge Dart article, January 2025 revision.
